  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(String id, GameController gameC)
      Constructor Game creates a new Game instance. Sets the game id and the game controller.
      Parameters:
      id - - the id of the game.
      gameC - - the game controller.

  • Method Details

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Method startGame initializes the game and notifies the players that the game has started.

    • chooseFirstPlayer

      public void chooseFirstPlayer()
      Method chooseFirstPlayer randomly chooses the first player and gives it the chair

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      Method nextTurn passes to the next turn by saving the current player in previousPlayer and then changing currentPlayer to the next one on the list. If the current player is the last on the list then it starts back from the first.

    • scoreBoard

      public void scoreBoard(ArrayList<Player> ps)
      Method scoreBoard ranks in descending order the players by their scores and then prints them.
      Parameters:
      ps - - the list of players

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Method initialize creates the board, CGCs, PGCs and chooses the first player.

    • gameHasEnded

      public void gameHasEnded()
      Method gameHasEnded calculates the score of each player and then notifies the players that the game has ended.

    • calculateScore

      public void calculateScore()
      Method calculateScore calculates the score of each player at the end of the game.

    • generateCGC

      public void generateCGC(int numOfPlayers)
      Method generateCGC generates and returns an ArrayList containing CommonGoalCard objects. First it generates 2 different random numbers from 0 to cardNodes (the number of card nodes in the JSON file). Then it iterates for how many cards are needed, adds the cards to commonGoalCards and adds the points to the cards depending on the number of players.
      Parameters:
      numOfPlayers - - the number of players in the current game

    • getNumberOfCardNodes

      public int getNumberOfCardNodes()
      Method getNumberOfCardNodes returns the number of card nodes in the JSON file containing the CGCs.

    • generatePGC

      public void generatePGC(ArrayList<Player> players)
      Method generatePGC generates as many ints (all random and different) as there are players. Then it assigns a personal goal card to each player
      Parameters:
      players - - The Arraylist of players

    • insertTiles

      public void insertTiles(int columnChosen, ArrayList<Tile> tiles)
      Method insertTiles inserts the tiles in the shelf of the current player. If the shelf is full and none of the players has already taken the endGame token, it sets the endGame token to the nickname of the current player and notifies all players that the last round has started.
      Parameters:
      columnChosen - - The column chosen by the player.
      tiles - - The tiles to be inserted.

    • setCurrentPlayer

      public void setCurrentPlayer(Player cPlayer)
      Method setCurrentPlayer sets the currentPlayer to the player passed as a parameter. Used for testing purposes.
      Parameters:
      cPlayer - - The player to be set as the currentPlayer.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Method getCurrentPlayer returns the currentPlayer.
      Returns:
      - The currentPlayer.
